pages.text: The $(mob)Forest Raven$() is an animal found in the $(thing)Twilight Forest$(). It flies around and flees when hit. It spawns much more commonly around $(thing)Obsidian Monoliths$().

$(mob)Forest Ravens$() drop $(item)Raven Feathers$() on death. They are used to craft the $(item)Magic Map Focus$() in order to make the $(item)Magic Map$(), an essential tool for finding locations and bosses in the $(thing)Twilight Forest$().
